title: Nixie NXT1 Watch face
summary: Nixie NXT1 is combines steampunk style and smartwatch functionality.
description: Nixie NXT1 is an digital interactive Android Wear watch face that combines steampunk style and smartwatch functionality. This watch face has a multitude of customization's and suits both round and square screens.. Each face was designed to suit black and silver watches. This app works with all watches running "Android Wear".News:- Added setting for changing screen timeout (after ambient settings)★ FEATURES• Stopwatch• Timer• Interval timer (Pomodoro technique)• 8 skins• Step counter (Google Fit)• Battery level• 24 or 12 hour digital clocks• Date (day of month, month, year)• 3 ambient modes• Low battery usage★ COMPATIBLE WITH• Huawei Watch• Sony Smartwatch 3• Moto360• Moto 360 2nd gen• LG G Watch R• LG G Watch W100• LG Watch Urbane• Samsung Gear Live• Asus ZenWatch• Asus ZenWatch 2.• TAG Heuer• Nixon Mission• Michael Kors• Fossil Q• Casio Smart WSD-F10• Polar M600Tested with Sony 3 and Huawei watch.Please leave your comments and ratings.Thank you for downloading our watch face !!!Google+: https://plus.google.com/106631378606783868077Twitter: https://twitter.com/PiKA_WATCH
descriptionHTML:
Nixie NXT1 is an digital interactive Android Wear watch face that combines steampunk style and smartwatch functionality. This watch face has a multitude of customization's and suits both round and square screens.. Each face was designed to suit black and silver watches. This app works with all watches running "Android Wear".

News:
- Added setting for changing screen timeout (after ambient settings)

★ FEATURES
• Stopwatch
• Timer
• Interval timer (Pomodoro technique)
• 8 skins
• Step counter (Google Fit)
• Battery level
• 24 or 12 hour digital clocks
• Date (day of month, month, year)
• 3 ambient modes
• Low battery usage

★ COMPATIBLE WITH
• Huawei Watch
• Sony Smartwatch 3
• Moto360
• Moto 360 2nd gen
• LG G Watch R
• LG G Watch W100
• LG Watch Urbane
• Samsung Gear Live
• Asus ZenWatch
• Asus ZenWatch 2.
• TAG Heuer
• Nixon Mission
• Michael Kors
• Fossil Q
• Casio Smart WSD-F10
• Polar M600

Tested with Sony 3 and Huawei watch.
Please leave your comments and ratings.
Thank you for downloading our watch face !!!

Google+: https://plus.google.com/106631378606783868077
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PiKA_WATCH
comments: I installed this but nowhere does the watch face show up... Tried several times then uninstalled. It never showed up in watch faces on wear app or on watch?  Waited for half  hour.
Thank you for the watch and generosity of giving...
Nice watch.    Can you add a setting to change the active time on?
